thread.title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Shagun’s Grand Baby Shower - Gulabo In Trouble Because Of Nidhi!
thread.title_full: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Shagun’s Grand Baby Shower - Gulabo In Trouble Because Of Nidhi!

title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Shagun’s Grand Baby Shower - Gulabo In Trouble Because Of Nidhi!
text:
» Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Shagun’s Grand Baby Shower - Gulabo In Trouble Because Of Nidhi! Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Shagun’s Grand Baby Shower - Gulabo In Trouble Because Of Nidhi! In Yeh Hai Mohabbatein, Ishita will organise Shagun’s baby shower. Nidhi enters the hosue with the help of Mani. Raman will get into trouble because of Nidhi! Published: Wednesday, February 22, 2017, 20:02 [IST] Subscribe to Filmibeat 
In Yeh Hai Mohabbatein , Nidhi is back in Raman (Karan Patel) and Ishita's ( Divyanka Tripathi ) lives to create more trouble. She doesn't even spare Ishita and Raman's friends, as she is seen using Mani as a bait to ruin IshRa's life.It is known that Nidhi makes the police believe that she is dead in the blast. She threatens Mani to help her escape and enters his house in a different avatar. Mani is helpless as Nidhi would hurt his aunt if he refused to help her. Read on to know the spoiler... Nidhi's New Avatar 
As we know Nidhi has changed the avatar. She will enter Mani's house as party planner. Apparently, she will be taking care of decorations at the function. Gulabo In Trouble! 
But, she will also be seen creating problems for Raman who is seen as Gulabo. According to the spoiler, Gulabo will be seen pointing an error, which Nidhi doesn't like and lashes out at Gulabo. Shagun’s Baby Shower 
As we revealed earlier, Ishita organise Shagun's baby shower, while Mihika takes care of the arrangements. The ladies will be seen in South Indian look. Nidhi & Mani 
Shagun will be showered with gifts. The ladies perform the ritual and gifts Shagun. Mani is glad to see Shagun happy, while Nidhi starts blackmailing Mani! Mihika & Ishita 
Meanwhile, a lady will find a fruit missing and lashes out at Mihika for not taking care of the arrangements properly. Nidhi Blames Gulabo! 
While Ishita thinks kids must have eaten the fruit, Nidhi interrupts and tells them that Gulabo has eaten the food! Ishita is upset with Gulabo because of the same. Did Nidhi get to know about Raman? Romi & Adi Serve Juice 
On the other hand, Romi and Adi will be seen in Madrasi avatar. They enter the house as helpers. They will be seen serving juice to the guests. Story So Far... In the previous episode, we saw Ishita worried about her mother and Mrs Bhalla. She finds out from her father that they are missing Ishita a lot, but are not revealing the same. Ishita reaches the Bhalla house and finds Mrs Bhalla in pain. She applies ointment and asks Ishita to solve her problem with Raman and get back to the house. She even calls Raman.Raman answers Mrs Bhalla's call, but she is shocked as she would hear girls talking. Mrs Bhalla is suspicious about Raman and asks Ishita to keep a track on Raman.Mrs Bhalla even takes Ishita to Raman's office to find if Raman is at office or lying to them. They will be shocked to know that Raman is not at office. Raman will be with Shagun at the clinic as Gulabo.Apparently, Romi manages to inform Raman about Mrs Bhalla. Raman rushes to the office and will be shocked as Mrs Bhalla catches him red-handed with ladies ornaments. She questions him as to what are those ladies ornaments doing in his cabin, while Raman starts blabbering!Will Raman be caught or gives an excuse and escape? Stay locked to this space for the latest updates of the show... Other articles published on Feb 22, 2017 Please Wait while comments are loading...
